keyMappings:
unmapAll
" VIM
map j scrollDown
map k scrollUp
map gg scrollToTop
map G scrollToBottom
map <c-d> scrollPageDown
map <c-u> scrollPageUp
map h scrollLeft
map l scrollRight
map zh scrollLeft
map zl scrollRight
map yy copyCurrentUrl
map p openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab
map P openCopiedUrlInNewTab
map i enterInsertMode
map v enterVisualMode
map V enterVisualLineMode
map gi focusInput
map mm Marks.activateCreateMode swap
map ` Marks.activateGotoMode swap
map / enterFindMode
map n performFind
map N performBackwardsFind
map H previousTab
map L nextTab
map u goBack
map ? showHelp
map <c-r> goForward
map <c-o> passNextKey
mapkey <c-c> <c-[>

" Chrome
map r reload
map R reload hard
map f LinkHints.activateMode
map <space>jj LinkHints.activateMode
map <space>jw LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
map <space>ja LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
map <space>ff Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map <space>fb Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab
map <space>fe Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
map <space>q removeTab
map <space>Q closeOtherTabs
map <space><tab> visitPreviousTab
map <space>0 firstTab
map <space>$ lastTab
map <space>ws duplicateTab
map <space>wu restoreTab
map J goNext
map K goPrevious
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
# y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
# d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
